title: Norges Bank: Norway's central bank says liquidity auction disrupted on Friday, now up again
description: OSLO: The Norwegian central bank experienced disruptions when conducting an F-deposit auction earlier on Friday, with bids having to be submitted by email and phone, but the auction system is up again, it said on Friday.The central bank regularly offers short-term fixed-rate lending and deposit faci...

title: Norway Central Bank: Norway central bank marks 12th rate hike, hints at future rise
description: Oslo : Norway's central bank said Thursday it was raising its main interest rate to four percent, its 12th hike in less than two years, and said another raise was expected in September." Consumer price inflation has edged down but remains high and markedly above the target," Norges Bank said in a st...

title: Global Markets Alert: Norway Central Bank Cuts Interest Rate to 4.25%
description:
Norway central bank cuts rates in surprise move

"The economic outlook is uncertain, but if the economy evolves broadly as currently projected, the policy rate will be reduced further in the course of 2025," Norges Bank said in a statement.

title: Norway's Wealth Tax Exodus: Balancing Equality and Economic Growth
description: The lakeside villa of Borger Borgenhaug in Lucerne stands as a testament to Norway's contentious wealth tax. The former carpenter turned real-estate mogul laments familial separation, attributing his relocation to Norway's stringent fiscal measures. Borgenhaug's move symbolizes a broader exodus as N...

title: India-Norway trade partnership: A green future ahead
description:
India and Norway are on the brink of a new phase in their trade relations, with a historic agreement set to expand cooperation in key sectors such as energy, maritime industries, and green technologies.

title: Norway's Wealth Tax: Balancing Equality and Entrepreneurial Exodus
description: Norway's wealth tax, effective since 1892, has become a contentious subject as it navigates between promoting equality and prompting a capital flight. The levy, which hits net wealth starting at 1.76 million crowns at 1% and 1.1% for wealth beyond 20.7 million crowns, has driven a notable exodus of ...

title: Soft Norway GDP supports easing case
description:
OSLO: Norway’s economy lagged expectations last quarter by barely growing in part due to a lower fisheries catch, with underlying trends likely still keeping the nation’s central bank on hold before it plans more easing next year.
